title: Out of the Blue
description: Kitty Danby meets Sammy Ray Bailey, an American pilot stationed nearby. They fall in love and, for a few weeks, the future holds a promise of happiness that Kitty hardly dares hope for. But it is 1944 and a tragic accident changes everything, leading to a web of secrets and misunderstandings which will only be unravelled years later.
author: Val Rutt
